content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **sizes ** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 **finished chest fullest point circumference ** 91 96 106 115 131 134 144 154 163 cm / 36 38 41½ 45½ 51¾ 53 56¾ 60½ 64 to be worn with 16cm / 6½ positive ease model s height is 155 5cm / 5 2 with a chest fullest point circumference of 114 3 cm / 45 and is wearing a size 5 **materials ** hobbii rainbow bamboo 60% viscose 40% cotton 100 g 3 5 oz = 250 m 273 yds shade jade 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 5 skeins **needles ** 3 5 mm / us 4 circular needles 100 cm / 40 length 3 mm / us 2 double pointed needles for i-cord always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 24 sts & 32 row = 10cm / 4 over st st worked in the round on 3 5 mm needles after blocking **pattern information ** this comfy top is worked from the top down seamlessly in one piece first the shoulders are worked flat and shaped using short row next the back and the fronts are worked separately until they reach the armhole depth then the body is worked in the round to the hem which is worked in stocking stitch and sewn to the inside of the body the neckline and armholes are finished with attached i-cord **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 http //hobbii
